mapper.select: SELECT g_num AS goodsCode , m_id AS memberId , g_photo AS goodsPhoto , g_cate AS goodsCate , g_name AS goodsName , g_point AS goodsPrice , g_detail AS goodsDetail , g_reg_date AS goodsRegDate FROM tb_Alliance_g

SELECT g.g_num AS goodsCode , g.g_photo AS goodsPhoto , g.g_name AS goodsName , g.g_detail AS goodsDetail , g.m_id AS memberId , g.g_cate AS goodsCate , g.g_point AS goodsPrice , g.g_reg_date AS goodsRegDate , m.m_name AS memberName FROM tb_Alliance_g as g INNER JOIN tb_member as m on g.m_id = m.m_id WHERE g_num = #{goodsCode}
